name: FFENVELOPE
desc: Used by the FFEFFECT structure to specify the optional envelope parameters for an effect.

items.name: init(dwSize: DWORD, dwAttackLevel: DWORD, dwAttackTime: DWORD, dwFadeLevel: DWORD, dwFadeTime: DWORD)
var dwAttackLevel: DWORD
items.desc: Amplitude for the start of the envelope, relative to the baseline, in the range from 0 through 10,000. If the effect's type-specific data does not specify a baseline, the amplitude is relative to 0.

items.name: var dwAttackTime: DWORD
items.desc: The time, in microseconds, to reach the sustain level.

items.name: var dwFadeLevel: DWORD
items.desc: Amplitude for the end of the envelope, relative to the baseline, in the range from 0 through 10,000. If the effect's type-specific data does not specify a baseline, the amplitude is relative to 0.

items.name: var dwFadeTime: DWORD
items.desc: The time, in microseconds, to reach the fade level.

items.name: var dwSize: DWORD
items.desc: Size, in bytes, of this structure. This member must be initialized before the structure is used.
